attributes.action: Introduce a new national curriculum to prepare students for the “real world”.
attributes.additional_details:
Many people are not ambitious enough about education. In result of this many children end up going down the wrong path getting themselves into trouble inside and outside of school. In order to make children more ambitious about school, schools should focus more on the true purpose of education. There are 2 fundamental tasks that it should help us with, working and sustaining good relationships. in order to address these needs a future national curriculum should be introduced.
https://youtu.be/HndV87XpkWg
attributes.background:
What is the point of school? 
The greatest problem of the modern education system is that it doesn’t focus on systematically preparing students for many aspects of the real challenges in life. The only way to solve this by introducing a new national curriculum.
